Name: Serene
Title: Serene
Desc: "We're going to solve everyone's troubles today, too!"

Talent.Name: Serene
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Triggers automatically once per Round:</color> 1 random <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C302218]</color> is added to your Hand.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>

C302218.Name: Melusine Support
C302218.Desc: A super sticker with random effects that embody the goodwill of all Melusine-kind.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
